QuestData.Title: Run For the Hills
QuestData.Description: The quilboar are up to something, something big. You need to stop it!$b$bThey've been busy bringing supplies up to the caves above their sanctum. Preserved thorns, cauldrons of venom, giant totems...$b$bThey're preparing for war.$b$bGet up there and destroy those stockpiles before they can be used against the citizens of the valley!
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope I'm wrong, but I've got a bad feeling about this.
QuestData.RewardText: Those supplies you destroyed should set them back. They must have been saving them for a while...
